entries.abort: We really needed your help getting through this system. We should have never hired you.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait at this location for the arrival of the company freighter.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters detected. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters eliminated. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.complete: The freighter has completed its run and has launched in hyperspace. Prepare to meet a new freighter.
entries.failed_destroy: You allowed the freighter to be destroyed. This does not bode well for the future of our company.
entries.failed_protect: You were hired to watch over that freighter until it could jump out of the system. We do not pay pilots, who do not complete their jobs.
entries.found_loc: Arrival location of the freighter located. Travel to this location and meet the freighter.
entries.goodbye_1: Thanks for watching over us. Be well, pilot.
entries.goodbye_2: Great work out there. We would never have made it past all those zealots without you.
entries.goodbye_3: I have my jump cooridnates locked in. Take care, pilot.
entries.goodbye_4: Preparing to make the jump to light speed. Safe journey to you.
entries.goodbye_5: You did good out there. Real good! See ya around.
entries.hull_half: Our hull is down to half strength! Requesting assistance.
entries.panic_1: Look out! Those cultists are back.
entries.panic_2: Great! Members of the debris cult.
entries.panic_3: I was hoping that this was going to be a nice quite flight.
entries.panic_5: Well, it looks like we are going to be swarmed by these loonies.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter from the system and protect it from the Debris Cultists.
entries.quest_location_d: Meet the freighter full of minerals from the surface and escort it from the system.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the arrival location of the freighter and wait for it to arrive.
entries.reason_1: I need to get this shipment of minerals to the Tatoo system. So just watch my back until I can make the jump out of the system.
entries.reason_2: I need to get this shipment of steel to the Corellian system. So just watch my back until I can make the jump out of the system.
entries.reason_3: I need to get this shipment of gas to the Naboo system. So just watch my back until I can make the jump out of the system.
entries.reason_4: I need to get this shipment of radioactives to the Lok system. So just watch my back until I can make the jump out of the system.
entries.reason_5: I need to get this shipment of ore to the Bespin system. So just watch my back until I can make the jump out of the system.
entries.shields_depleted: They just knocked out our shields! Get those fighters off of us.
entries.taunt_1: And the great fireball spoke and we listened...and it was good.
entries.taunt_2: Nirvana awaits those who float amongst the debris.
entries.taunt_3: The light in the sky tells us that you must join it.
entries.taunt_4: Mohab said unto the crowd...the infidels who tarnish the field must pay with their life's blood.
entries.taunt_5: You will be at peace soon, but I fear that an unbeliever like you will not be going to nirvana.
entries.thanks_1: The company sure got their moneys worth when they hired you.
entries.thanks_2: Well at least those cultists got what they wanted...to be part of the debris.
entries.thanks_3: I wonder if they will become martyrs for that?
entries.thanks_4: Perhaps they should have choosen another religion.
entries.thanks_5: The galaxy now has a few less loonies running around.
entries.title: Yavin System: Escort the Yavin Mining Co. Freighters
entries.title_d: The Yavin 4 Mining Company is being accused by the Debris Cult of transporting salvage from the Yavin system out of the area and they are doing everything in their power to stop those freighters. The Yavin 4 Mining Company has hired you to make sure that their freighters make it out of the system in one piece.
